name: History of Apple War
description:
A story/adventure game made for MiniLD#62: Final Boss. Game is incomplete and doesn't feature a boss fight. But builds the story for it. Sorry but deadlines. Have fun!

Programming: Burak "Mantlair" Çetin

Graphics: Bilge Su Sakarya (EDT: 05/04/16 This game is devoted to her.)

Music: A person who had some problems about recording.

--Controls--

Space: Pickup/Talk (Sometimes problematic. Try pressing again.)

Arrow Keys: Walk/Choose

M: Mute

R: Restart

Q: Close Game
